details: Embark on an epic journey in ancient Greece as a skilled assassin. Navigate political intrigue, forge alliances, and engage in intense combat. Choose your path and shape your destiny in this open-world action-adventure.

game: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
details: Embark on a quest to save the kingdom of Hyrule from the evil Calamity Ganon. Explore a vast open world, solve puzzles, battle formidable foes, and discover the secrets of the Sheikah Slate in this critically acclaimed action-adventure game.

Experience survival horror at its best in Resident Evil Village. Set in a mysterious village, face grotesque creatures, solve puzzles, and uncover the dark secrets lurking within. Are you ready to confront the horrors that await?

Immerse yourself in the epic world of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. Follow Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter for hire, as he searches for his adopted daughter. Engage in morally ambiguous choices, explore a vast open world, and experience a gripping narrative.
